summary: A follower mod that adds veteran Blades
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds Jakorn, Helen, Yaramir. Veteran Blades who survived the Thalmor war. Jakorn is a very loyal soldier and ready to follow the dragon born everywhere. Helen is an experienced archer who is very wise and has lots of knowledge, Yaramir is the old group leader who knows how to lead a group of units but is getting old and a bit crazy so its up to you to lead them.

I will be adding dialogue at a later update for now enjoy the blade followers mod.
author: Me
